Does this have audio commentary too? Two of the episodes on the DVD have this.

PhilGrim, these are just the episodes. 

No extras.
Is it DVDRIP? The DVD has two commentaries that are the only reason to have the dvd.
PhilGrim, we only ripped the episodes from the DVD, not the extra.

Yes but you could have ripped the extra audio track for the two chapters that had them. 

Any chance of a DVD ISO?
If requested by enough, we will put up the DVDR.

what about the MP3 tracks for the two commentaries? Easy enough to mux in Vdub.

That would be awesome :D

Thanks much mate!

I'd love to have the commentaries too.

Commentaries are delayed untill further notice, our provider seems to have gone MIA.

If anybody have the commentaries, feel free to post.
I want dvdr! I hope you will put up them so I can download them :-)
